document.full_text: thomas vanek scored a game-winning goal in overtime to ensure the buffalo sabres clinched an eastern conference playoff spot with a 4-3 comeback victory over the philadelphia flyers friday.
document.title: sabres' overtime victory over flyers clinches
lines_and_colors: thomas vanek scored a game-winning goal in overtime to ensure the buffalo sabres clinched an eastern conference playoff spot with a 4-3 comeback victory over the philadelphia flyers friday.
